<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Animal Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2494) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Beastkin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=337" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 80 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your shapeshifting grants you a magical connection to the animal world. You can cast [_animal messenger_](/Spells.aspx?ID=11), [_calm emotions_](/Spells.aspx?ID=31) (animals only), and [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) as 2nd-level primal innate spells once per day each. These spells use your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.
name: Animal Magic
